sentences.en: Anna was almost crying with frustration.
sentences.cn: 安娜沮丧得几乎要哭了.

sentences.en: But before you give up, I’d like you to ask yourself what your frustration is telling you.
sentences.cn: 但是，在你放弃之前，我希望你能问下自己，你的挫折在向你传达着怎样的讯息。

sentences.en: Dave thumped the table in frustration .
sentences.cn: 戴夫懊恼得捶打桌子。

sentences.en: He beat his hands on the steering wheel in frustration.
sentences.cn: 他沮丧地用手打了几下方向盘.

sentences.en: He had to fight back tears of frustration.
sentences.cn: 他不得不强忍住失意的泪水.

sentences.en: He took his pent up frustration out on his family.
sentences.cn: 他把因挫败而郁积的怒气发泄在家人身上.

sentences.en: Her words made his heart burn with frustration.
sentences.cn: 她那些话使他极端灰心丧气.

sentences.en: His response is one of anger and frustration.
sentences.cn: 他的回答充满了愤怒和懊丧。

sentences.en: I nearly went bonkers with frustration.
sentences.cn: 挫败感让我几近疯狂。

sentences.en: I was close to tears with frustration, but I held back.
sentences.cn: 我沮丧得快要哭出来，但我忍住了。

sentences.en: In spite of his frustrations, he fell in love with the country.
sentences.cn: 尽管失意，但他还是爱上了这个国家。

sentences.en: People often feel a sense of frustration that they are not being promoted quickly enough.
sentences.cn: 人们经常有一种挫折感，就是觉得自己升职不够快。

sentences.en: She went for a brisk walk to work off her frustration.
sentences.cn: 她快步走了一会儿，以排解心中的沮丧。

sentences.en: Sitting at home would only have had him climbing the walls with frustration.
sentences.cn: 呆在家里只会让他沮丧得抓狂。

sentences.en: Sometimes frustration and anger can boil over into direct and violent action.
sentences.cn: 有时挫折和愤怒会以直接的暴力形式爆发出来。

sentences.en: The results show the level of frustration among hospital doctors.
sentences.cn: 这些结果显示了医院医生的不满程度。

sentences.en: Their frustration and anger will manifest itself in crying and screaming.
sentences.cn: 他们用哭泣与尖叫表达自己的沮丧和愤怒。

sentences.en: There are moments when he feels great frustration and it bursts out of him.
sentences.cn: 会有这样的时刻:当他感觉很好挫折和它爆发出来了。

sentences.en: With a gesture of frustration, she swept the cards from the table.
sentences.cn: 她懊恼地把桌子上的牌都拂到了地上。

sentences.en: Your frustration could be an indication that you just need some input or assistance.
sentences.cn: 你的挫折可能是在暗示你只是需要一些意见或援助。

words.tran_cn: 挫败；阻挠（frustrate的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tran_en: the fact of being prevented from achieving what you are trying to achieve
